verse.name: v1
verse.lines: Take these hands and lift them up newline For I have not the strength to praise you near enough newline For I have nothing newline I have nothing without You

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: So take my voice and pour it out newline Let it sing the songs of mercy I have found newline For I have nothing newline I have nothing without You

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: And all my soul needs newline Is all your love to cover me newline So all the world will see newline That I have nothing newline Without You

verse.name: v4
verse.lines: Take my body and build it up newline May it be broken as an offering of love newline For I have nothing newline I have nothing without you

verse.name: v5
verse.lines: That I love you newline With all my heart newline With all my soul newline With all my mind newline All the strength that I can find

verse.name: v6
verse.lines: Take my time here on the earth newline And let it glorify all that You are worth newline For I am nothing without you
